title: Fragment, 1923-7-37, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: satin weave with continuous and discontinuous supplementary weft patterning (brocade)
creditline: Gift of Mrs. DeWitt Clinton Cohen
description: White satin ground with design of floral sprays repeated in horizontal rows. Green and white continuous supplementary wefts form part of the design, with yellow and rose brocading.
